sentences.en: Certain formalities have to be gone through before one can emigrate.
sentences.cn: 必须办妥某些手续方可移居他国.

sentences.en: Economists warn that enormous pressures could build up, forcing people to emigrate westwards.
sentences.cn: 经济学家警告，迫使人们向西部迁移的压力可能会增至很大的程度。

sentences.en: Go back there? I'd sooner emigrate!
sentences.cn: 回去? 我宁可移居海外也不回去!

sentences.en: He's a relative of course, but a thorn in our flesh. I wish he could emigrate.
sentences.cn: 他当然是亲戚, 但也是我们的肉中刺. 我但愿他也能移居到国外去.

sentences.en: I'll emigrate to the western woods.
sentences.cn: 我要移居到西部的丛林里去.

sentences.en: If you fail to get this job, there'll be nothing for it but to emigrate.
sentences.cn: 如果你得不到这个工作, 那除了移居国外就毫无门路了.

sentences.en: Many people had to emigrate during the nazi period.
sentences.cn: 纳粹统治期间,许多人不得不移居他国.

sentences.en: Of those who survived the famine, many were forced to emigrate to greener pastures.
sentences.cn: 那些在饥荒中存活下来的人, 很多都被迫迁居到未加开垦的草原上.

sentences.en: Pay great attention to death, so people do not emigrate.
sentences.cn: 使民众把生死看得很重, 而不往远处迁徒.

sentences.en: She was inhibited from making the decision to emigrate by the thought of her mother's loneliness.
sentences.cn: 她因担心母亲会感到孤独而不能作出移居国外的决定.

sentences.en: The family decided to shake the dust from their feet and emigrate to Australia.
sentences.cn: 这一家人决定愤然离开,移居澳大利亚.

sentences.en: The family decided to uproot themselves and emigrate to Australia.
sentences.cn: 他们全家决定离开故土,移居澳大利亚.

sentences.en: The men emigrate to work as seamen.
sentences.cn: 男人们移居国外当海员。

words.tran_cn: 移民；移民出境；移居外国

trans.tran_en: to leave your own country in order to live in another country
to leave your own country in order to live in another country
